title.rendered: $5,000 Eaton – Indigenous Clean Energy Scholarship | Summer 2024

content.rendered:
Eaton Electrical Canada has gladly collaborated with Indigenous Clean Energy scholarship to help Indigenous students across Canada by offering a $5,000 grant, alongside a paid entry level position.

Native understudies taking a stab at a profession accomplishing electrical work, who appreciate voyaging, are urged to apply.

The grant is intended to be utilized for post-optional schooling costs, towards apprenticeship, an exchanges endorsement, a recognition, or a science certificate centered in the electrical field.

The entry level position will give the beneficiary important involvement in electrical frameworks and environmentally friendly power. We trust that the beneficiary investigates vocation open doors in the Canadian electrical industry.

Prerequisites for Eligibility for Indigenous Clean Energy Scholarship.

  • Possessed a diploma from high school.
  • a valid driver’s license from Canada.
  • willing and able to accept a paid internship with Eaton for four months.

There are three intakes for this application, each with its own application deadline. When you get a scholarship, you don’t have to start your internship right away. Chosen beneficiaries will have dependent upon one schedule year to start their temporary position with Eaton.

End of summer intake: June 30, 2024.

Deadline for fall intake: 31 October 2024

How Do I Apply?

  • Complete the application form online
  • Submit a brief personal statement answering the following two questions, to a maximum of 250 words each:
    • What will an internship with Eaton mean to you?
    • Where does your passion for the electrical field come from?
  • Answer three short questions indicating your experience with:
    • Basic electrical testing and troubleshooting
    • Basic Power Distribution Systems
    • Basic Renewable Energy Systems (eg Solar, Battery Energy Storage, etc.)
  • To attach your resumé to your application, please use the “My Documents” page. You can upload your resumé directly.
